titleStmt.title: [A prognostication made for the yeare of our Lorde God, 1572 wherein at large is set forth the description of the fovver quarters of the yeare, with the prediction of the weather for euery day, exactly calculated for Oxenforde. By Thomas Hill, of London student.]
titleStmt.author: Hill, Thomas, b. ca. 1528.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard VVatkins, and Iames Roberts,

notesStmt.note: Title and imprint taken from subsidiary title page.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Imperfect; prognostication only, with several leaves missing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
